title: Charlie Day | Trump and Rudy Were Directly Involved in Plan to Seize Voting Machines: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Donald Trump’s intimate involvement with plans to seize voting machines and stay in power in the waning days of his presidency.

Then, Charlie Day reflects on his time hosting Saturday Night Live before talking about producing It’s Always Sunny in Philadelphia and working with Jenny Slate in I Want You Back.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
